OOC: Nooooooo! Not the shits!

BIC: Shokaract did not know he had those dea=
dly shits. He raised his cannon and fired 3 more shits at Hell Drak! They w=
ere about to collide with Hell Drak's shits, when suddenly, the rule of no =
interception came into play! The disks sliced into Shokaract, spilling mech=
 fluid all around!

Shokaract: Ahh! Moder!...

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Friday, September 14, 2001 4:06 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokarac=
t


  "You spudnick, you!  Damn you, spuckley!" Hell Drak yelled, avoiding =
some of the shits, but getting hit by some of the others.
   
  She fired b=
ack two sputnick lazer discuses.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From=
: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thu=
rsday, September 13, 2001 11:52 PM
    Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract=



    OOC: As tempted as I am, I cannot let my characters just explode. I =
need to keep repeating that to myself.

    BIC: Shokaract didn't expect th=
e disks, and one hit him almost harmlessly, but the other sliced into him. =
Green goo sprayed from a crevice in his side. However, he was silent about =
it. He aimed the gattling gun at Hell Drak and fired 3 laser bolts from it,=
 then raised his tiny hot dog gun and fired 4 shots from it, also aimed at =
Hell Drak...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Testifier: Ab=
yssian Badass 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, Sept=
ember 13, 2001 7:28 AM
      Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


      "=
No way, bitchwheat!" Hell Drak yelled, rolling and firing two lazer discs a=
t Shokaract.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Roland the=
 Last Gunslinger 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesd=
ay, September 12, 2001 11:52 PM
        Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokarac=
t


        It hit Shokaract. EXPLODE! Somehow, the language woke Shokaract=
 from his trance, not the missile. He transformed into robot mode and becko=
ned Hell Drak to come closer with a movement of his hand...

          ----=
- Original Message ----- 
          From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
     =
     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2=
001 11:19 PM
          Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


          Hel=
l Drak avoided the missile.
           
          "Not this time, fucko!" H=
ell Drak yelled, firing a lazer back at Shokaract.
            ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
            From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
           =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 200=
1 9:53 PM
            Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


            Th=
e lasers his Shokaract all 4 times, but he didn't seem to notice, he was fi=
xated on some thing only he could see, something from his own mind. Ahh! PS=
YCHO! Shokaract fires a single missile back at Hell Drak...

              =
----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Testifier: Abyssian Badas=
s 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday,=
 September 12, 2001 9:29 PM
              Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokar=
act


              ::Headshot/Hell Drak/Triggerhappy::
               
   =
           Headshot ducked by a tree.  One of Orion's shots nailed him in t=
he side.
               
              "Ah, f***!!!!!!!" Headshot yelled, h=
olding his side in pain, getting up from being knocked down.
              =
 
              Headshot climbed up into the tree, and fired a sniper shot =
at Orion.  Headshot was standing up, so, if he was hit......(hint hint!)
  =
            ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
              Hell Drak was hit by the two miss=
iles.  She went flying back into a wall.  Hell Drak fired 4 lazers at Shoka=
ract.
              ~~~~~~~~
              Triggerhappy flew out of the way=
 of Orion's shots.  Triggerhappy flew down, attempting to ram right into Or=
ion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
